We can leverage R to create randomized studies using
[shinysurveys](https://www.jdtrat.com/packages/shinysurveys/) with learnr

```{r eval = FALSE}
library("shinysurveys")
library("learnr")
```

ou can also use [formr](https://formr.org/) to create survey with `R`.
